page.title: 18A RELIGIOUS CEREMONY.
page.content: Teenagers thoughts of her confirmation "I had been looking forward to my confirmation for weeks, the classes I'd attended taught me about the step which I was about to take and made me realise how little I knew about God. On the morning of 24th February 1985 I received gifts to remind me of my confirmation. My Godparents, my family and I then went to Naunton Beauchamp church where the ceremony was to be performed by the Bishop of Dudley. I knelt down before the Bishop, and my mum, who was my sponsor, placed her hand on my right shoulder. The Bishop put his hand on my head and confirmed me. All the candidates then took Holy Communion for the first time. Afterwards the Bishop presented us each with an Alternative Services book and talked to us and our families over coffee and biscuits."
